name: Crash Master
description:
Crash Master will test your car driving skills. Awesome 3D Car Jump and Crash action.
Race your car down the track and hit the jump. The objective is crash into the objects on each level. If you hit your mark, you will advance to the next level. Super fun demolition and drag racing action.
JUMP AND FLY THROUGH THE AIR
This is truly a fun driving experience.
MANY SPORTS CARS AND TRUCKS TO CHOOSE FROM
Choose your favorite car or truck to use for the jump. Play around with it until you get the one your like the most.
TIP : To slow down the car, you can try turning the car side to side.
APP FEATURES:
-- 4 Exciting 3D Driving Scenes
-- Castle, Countryside, Medieval, and Halloween Fright Night
-- 32 Levels
-- Easy One Touch Gameplay
-- 8 Different Cars and Trucks to Choose From
-- Excellent car racing, drifting and jumping physics
If you enjoy Crash Master, please check out the other Jellyfish Giant 3D animal simulators including Dinosaur, Wolf, Lion, Bear, and Anaconda Snake Simulator.
Follow us @jellyfishgiant
